text: September Affair is a 1950 musical movie that was produced by Hal B. Wallis and was directed by William Dieterle. The movie was released on October 18, 1950 in North America. The movie received positive reviews and also won a Golden Globe Award in 1951 for Best Original Score. == Cast == *Joan Fontaine as Manina Stuart *Joseph Cotten as David Lawrence *Fran√ßoise Rosay as Maria Salvatini *Jessica Tandy as Catherine Lawrence *Robert Arthur as David Lawrence Jr *Jimmy Lydon as Johnny Wilson *Fortunio Bonanova as Grazzi *Grazia Narciso as Bianca *Anna Demetrio as Rosita *Lou Steele as Vittorio Portini *Frank Yaconelli as Mr. Peppino *Hal B. Wallis as a tourist in a souvenir shop (uncredited) (cameo) == Other websites == *September Affair at TMC Movie Database * Category:1950 musical movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle
title: September Affair
